err::cg_exception

static void cg_check_error ()

Detailed Description

Cg exception class.

Indicate a cg exception in the framework. Contains a important function - cg_check_error(), which check cg state, and inform about any problems.

Member Function Documentation

void err::cg_exception::cg_check_error (  )  [static]

Function checking error state CG lib.

Check state and return it, ideal to throwing an exception eg. 

         if (err::cg_exception::cg_check_error() != CG_NO_ERROR)
                throw err::cg_exception("Something happened");
